examples.example: 如果我有足够的时间的话，我一定会去学习更多的知识。

translate.english: If I have enough time, I will definitely go to learn more knowledge.

examples.example: 如果我能实现梦想的话，那该有多好啊。

translate.english: If I can realize my dream, how wonderful it would be.

examples.example: 如果大家都能互相帮助的话，这个世界将会变得更加美好。

translate.english: If everyone can help each other, the world will become more beautiful.
